description: On DELETE to /servers/id/meta/key I get a 200 instead of a 204 that the spec requires.
title: OSAPI: Server Metadata response codes

comments.content:
Many Server metadata response codes are off.  I get lots of 200's on POST/PUT to /servers/id/meta and /servers/id/meta/key, where the spec says I should get 201.

On DELETE to /servers/id/meta/key I also get a 200 instead of a 204 that the spec requires.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~throughnothing

comments.content: The spec changed, so I updated the description of the bug to reflect what actually needed to happen. It was actually addressed in a previous branch, so this bug is done.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon
